statements: SELECT * FROM improv_group
SELECT performance_id, show_date, venue FROM improv_group WHERE performance_id = 1
SELECT venue, show_date, show_time FROM improv_group ORDER BY show_date DESC
SELECT audience_feedback FROM improv_group WHERE audience_feedback IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM improv_group WHERE show_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM improv_group WHERE performance_id = 1;
SELECT show_date, show_time FROM improv_group WHERE performance_id = 2;
SELECT venue, audience_feedback FROM improv_group WHERE show_date = '2022-03-15';
SELECT * FROM improv_group WHERE venue LIKE '%Theater%';
SELECT performance_id, venue, audience_feedback FROM improv_group ORDER BY show_date DESC, show_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM performances;
SELECT performance_id, location, date, start_time, end_time FROM performances;
SELECT feedback_id, audience_member_name, rating, feedback_text FROM feedback;
SELECT performance_id, location, date FROM performances WHERE audience_capacity > 100;
SELECT * FROM performances WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM performances WHERE audience_capacity > 100 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT location, start_time, end_time FROM performances WHERE location='Concert Hall' AND start_time < '18:00:00'
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM feedback WHERE performance_id=5
SELECT audience_member_name, rating FROM feedback WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY audience_member_name ASC
SELECT performance_id, date, location, audience_capacity FROM performances INNER JOIN feedback ON performances.performance_id = feedback.performance_id WHERE feedback.rating < 3
SELECT * FROM performances;
SELECT location, date, time FROM performances WHERE feedback_score > 8;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM performers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM audience_feedback ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT performance_id, date, feedback_score FROM performances WHERE location = 'Concert Hall';
SELECT * FROM performances WHERE feedback_score > 90;
SELECT performance_id, date, location FROM performances WHERE date = '2022-07-15' ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM performers WHERE first_name LIKE '%ana%' AND last_name LIKE '%son%';
SELECT performance_id, audience_member_name, feedback_text FROM audience_feedback ORDER BY feedback_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM performances p JOIN performers pr ON p.performance_id = pr.performer_id WHERE p.date >= '2022-09-01' AND pr.phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT * FROM performance_schedule WHERE show_id = 1;
SELECT performer_name, show_date, show_time FROM performance_schedule WHERE show_date >= '2022-10-01';
SELECT show_id, location, performer_name FROM performance_schedule WHERE is_cancelled = FALSE;
SELECT feedback_id, performer_name, performance_rating FROM performer_feedback WHERE performance_rating > 3;
SELECT audience_name, feedback_text, feedback_date FROM audience_feedback WHERE show_id = 2;
SELECT show_id, location, performer_name, show_date, show_time FROM performance_schedule;
SELECT * FROM performer_feedback WHERE performance_rating >= 4;
SELECT audience_name, feedback_text, feedback_date, show_id FROM audience_feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT performer_name, show_date, show_time FROM performance_schedule WHERE is_cancelled = FALSE AND show_time > '18:00:00';
SELECT performer_name, performance_date, performance_time FROM performer_schedule WHERE performer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM performances;
SELECT venue_name, show_date, show_time FROM performances WHERE show_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT performer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM performers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT venue_name, location FROM venues WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM schedules WHERE show_date = '2022-06-15' AND show_time > '18:00:00';
SELECT * FROM performances;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM performers WHERE last_name = 'Smith';
SELECT venue_name, location FROM venues WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY venue_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT p.show_date, p.show_time, v.venue_name FROM performances p JOIN venues v ON p.venue_name = v.venue_name WHERE p.show_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT p.show_date, p.show_time, pe.first_name, pe.last_name FROM performances p JOIN schedules s ON p.performance_id = s.performance_id JOIN performers pe ON s.performer_id = pe.performer_id WHERE pe.last_name <> 'Johnson';
